replies.body: When is this "early sale" of the new skins supposed to happen?
The Feb early sale is going on right now, the March early sale will happen...in March! Keep an eye out for a separate news post about it during the month.
Does anyone know when Self-Gifting will be back? I bought about $400 worth of RP for that purpose and just found out that it's gone. Ripperino :c
We just had self gifting twice in OCE with Ocean Week and the regular global self gifting release. Not sure when it will be back but it might be a while before we see it again. :\
When is the early sale for Feb....?
The [Feb early sales are live now](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/february-early-sales) and ending soon. Pick up what you were looking for before it ends!
During the early days of May. Lol im desperate as well {{item:3070}} I really want firecracker {{champion:222}} and project {{champion:238}}.
